channel.title: Client issues and server trouble
channel.description:
Howdy MoparScape, I'm having a few troubles on both ends of the bridge so I figure I'll whip them all up here in one go.
First, I'm using the FreedomX 718 source with a 742 Cache and all is going... pretty well. I'm attempting to change the background using Steve's Sprite Editor and the Runescape Background utility. The problem being once I replace the images and repack the cache something horrible happens and my Java Console throws me a terrible error. I replace the cache, and everything is good until I try again.
Second, when attempting to make a JAR File so I can distribute a client to greater expand testing purposes but when creating the Jar file using the Client Class files, I double click the client an absolutely nothing happened. Strange, can't find out what's causing the problem.
Third and foremost my highscores are acting up. I'm using a Tutorial and files from a thread I found on Rune-Server and after some trial and error, got them installed.
hiscores.java created: Check Code Strings added to ButtonHandler and Player.java: Check Successfully Connected to database: Check Player stats saved to database: Supposedly check User Information placed in the hs_users table: Not at all check.
I'm not sure why it's not saving the information into the table, only that it's not getting to the table.
I know that server trouble is supposed to go into a separate thread but figured I would kill three birds with one stone.
Tips, help and suggestions are greatly appreciated! Cody

item.title: Client issues and server trouble
item.dc:creator: @CodySP CodySP
item.description:
@CodySP wrote:

Howdy MoparScape, I’m having a few troubles on both ends of the bridge so I figure I’ll whip them all up here in one go.

First, I’m using the FreedomX 718 source with a 742 Cache and all is going… pretty well. I’m attempting to change the background using Steve’s Sprite Editor and the Runescape Background utility. The problem being once I replace the images and repack the cache something horrible happens and my Java Console throws me a terrible error. I replace the cache, and everything is good until I try again.

Second, when attempting to make a JAR File so I can distribute a client to greater expand testing purposes but when creating the Jar file using the Client Class files, I double click the client an absolutely nothing happened. Strange, can’t find out what’s causing the problem.

Third and foremost my highscores are acting up. I’m using a Tutorial and files from a thread I found on Rune-Server and after some trial and error, got them installed.

hiscores.java created: Check
Code Strings added to ButtonHandler and Player.java: Check
Successfully Connected to database: Check
Player stats saved to database: Supposedly check
User Information placed in the hs_users table: Not at all check.

I’m not sure why it’s not saving the information into the table, only that it’s not getting to the table.

I know that server trouble is supposed to go into a separate thread but figured I would kill three birds with one stone.

Tips, help and suggestions are greatly appreciated!
Cody
